description: This file defines a Pydantic data model for a movie script and creates an agent that summarizes a movie script based on location, utilizing external modules for AI model interaction and data validation.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate and print a response based on input, here used with 'New York'.
